item.title: Every Outbound Link Leaks Privacy
item.description: Contains security and privacy advice on how to properly use outbound links in your web-facing code.

item.title: Swagger and OpenAPI
item.description: A tutorial that will guide you through the process of setting up an OpenAPI (aka Swagger) document, as well as exploring the ecosystem.
